messages: RT @stephenfry: Good lord? Is this real? It has at least the virtue of honesty (via @pandafeets http://t.co/b9bpbLb7yU
@FrederikVidal @universenme I went to the Van Gogh museum in Amsterdam. I've never been into 'art'. I can't paint, ya know? If you go there-
@PRanganathan @andylassner 'HER' is my pick for Best Screenplay - and if I'm wrong I don't care :)
@FocusFeatures @McConaughey @JaredLeto @HeyUGuys get to know YOU as you and it will lessen the ability to portray someone else.....?
